con:restRequest.name: createMarketingPromo
createPromoSailingRange
con:restRequest.con:request: { "header": { "application": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#application}", "brand": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#brand}", "domainId": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#domainId}", "language": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#language}", "uuid": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#uuid}" }, "promo": { "promoId": ${Properties#promoId}, "shipCode": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#shipCode}", "startSailDate": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#startSailDate}", "endSailDate": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#endSailDate}", "effectiveStartDate": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#effectiveStartDate}", "effectiveEndDate": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#effectiveEndDate}", "webLocationId": ${DataSource - promoSailingRange#webLocationID}, "promoValueType": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#promoValueType}", "promoValue": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#promoValue}" } }

con:restRequest.name: updatePromoSailingRange
con:restRequest.con:request: { "header": { "application": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#application}", "brand": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#brand}", "domainId": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#domainId}", "language": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#language}", "uuid": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#uuid}" }, "promo": { "promoRangeId": "${Properties#promoRangeID}", "promoId": "${Properties#promoId}", "shipCode": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#shipCode}", "startSailDate": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#startSailDate}", "endSailDate": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#endSailDate}", "effectiveStartDate": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#effectiveStartDate}", "effectiveEndDate": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#UpdateEffectiveEndDate}", "webLocationId": "${Properties#webLocationID}", "promoValueType": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#promoValueType}", "promoValue": "${DataSource - promoSailingRange#promoValue}" } }
